name: goautoscore
description: Automatic scoring for finished Go games

scripts.optimize:js: npm run optimize:js:app && npm run optimize:js:ports && npm run optimize:js:worker
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css
scripts.config:development: cp src/config/development.js dist/ && mv dist/development.js dist/config.js
scripts.config:staging: cp src/config/staging.js dist/ && mv dist/staging.js dist/config.js
scripts.config:production: cp src/config/production.js dist/ && mv dist/production.js dist/config.js
scripts.copy:development: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:manifest && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:seo
scripts.copy:production: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:manifest && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:seo
scripts.build:development: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development && npm run config:development
scripts.build:staging: npm run elm:development && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development && npm run config:staging
scripts.build:production: npm run elm:production && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:production && npm run config:production && npm run optimize
scripts.install:staging: npm run elm:install && npm run build:staging
scripts.install:production: npm run elm:install && npm run build:production
scripts.watch: npm run watch:elm & npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:html & npm run watch:manifest

author: Lode Lesage
